short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share gift product information via social networks, manage wish lists
short.vi: Chia sẻ thông tin sản phẩm quà tặng qua mạng xã hội, quản lý danh sách mong muốn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"The Perfect Gift" application is a tool that helps users easily search and calculate prices of various gift products. With a friendly and easy-to-use interface, users can choose from a diverse list of products such as handbags, water bottles, notebooks, Bluetooth headsets, premium towels, and store gift certificates. , entertainment services such as cinemas, restaurants, spas and more.

When the user selects the desired product and quantity, the application will automatically calculate the price based on the selected product information. Users can then share product information on social networks such as Facebook and Twitter or send it via email.

In addition, the application also provides a "Wishlist" feature that helps users save a list of products they are interested in. Users can easily add and remove products in this list.

Additionally, the app also offers a gift card balance troll feature: Users simply enter the card number and the app displays the current balance.

With convenient and diverse features, "The Perfect Gift" promises to bring a convenient and enjoyable online shopping experience to users.
